+

+        pass

+        pass

+class Bundle(object):
+    """A bundle of recipes to be sent to the client."""
+    def __init__(self, recipes=None):
+        self.recipes = recipes or []
+

+    def ids(self):
+        return [recipe.id for recipe in self.recipes]

+    @property
